title: Ep. 1097 - Putin Drops The Snowden Bomb
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEl

Russia grants American dissident Edward Snowden citizenship, the COVID vaccine turns up in breast milk, and a study shows that loneliness increases aging more than smoking.
